name: Scentsational
description: "Scentsational" is a text-based game featuring baker, Nia. She's opened her very first bakery in honor of her late mother. On this day in particular, the judge from the American Culinary Federation has come to try her treats for the title of "Pastry Chef of the Year." She must make the right choices, whether it's her helpers in the kitchen, the dessert she selects, or the ingredients she uses, to impress him.
